caseTitle: Syed Hakeem Shah and others v. Muhammad Idrees and others
tagline: When the sale consideration is totally paid and possession was also delivered to the transferee and only on account of the ban on the registration of leases that transfer document was not executed, transferee was well within his right to seek execution of the sublease in his favour when the ban was lifted and when the transferor unlawfully entered into sale transaction with a third party. In this background, it cannot be said that suit was barred by time.
